mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.hospital_id, t.dept_id, t.doctor_code, t.add_time
mapper.delete: delete from hospital_guahao_log where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into hospital_guahao_log ( user_id, hospital_id, dept_id, doctor_code, add_time ) values( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
